analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/36/0xa563dfebbb58ac0acdb9113bac9d9617896c5aab.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/36/0xa563dfebbb58ac0acdb9113bac9d9617896c5aab.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(_to) (/unique_chucks/36/0xa563dfebbb58ac0acdb9113bac9d9617896c5aab.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleClosed (/unique_chucks/36/0xa563dfebbb58ac0acdb9113bac9d9617896c5aab.sol)

Crowdsale.externalPurchase (/unique_chucks/36/0xa563dfebbb58ac0acdb9113bac9d9617896c5aab.sol#351-359) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/36/0xa563dfebbb58ac0acdb9113bac9d9617896c5aab.sol#359)

Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/36/0xa563dfebbb58ac0acdb9113bac9d9617896c5aab.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/36/0xa563dfebbb58ac0acdb9113bac9d9617896c5aab.sol)
